questions.question: ABSTEMIOUS
questions.answer: D (Abstemious = self-denying/moderate; Flamboyant/Indulgent is opposite. Given options, Flamboyant is closest to 'excessive/showy' vs 'restrained'). Correction: Abstemious means moderate in eating/drinking. Antonym should be Gluttonous/Self-indulgent. 'Flamboyant' means showy. None are perfect. However, if Abstemious implies 'plain/restrained', Flamboyant is 'showy/unrestrained'.

questions.question: ARID
questions.answer: D (Fertile is opposite of barren/arid in agricultural sense, or 'Wet/Humid'. Fertile is best here).

questions.answer: C (Safe - Note: Peril is noun, Safe is adj. 'Safety' would be better. But 'Safe' implies lack of peril).
